description.text: Since you are no longer bound to a contract....you are free to go....unless you want to stay and help me find the Elytra...?

description.translate:
We found it! We did it! Together, as friends! I didn't expect you would have stayed.....why did you stay? 
What? -The pixie turns red and waves her arms around in panic- ...we're...friends?
 Friends huh....? -The pixie smiles happily - 
 The Audacity! Friends! Hmph....you wish!? 
 Thanks...friend. Let's go home?
